name: Fire Keeper (jeroenpx)
description:
Laggy?

If the version in the browser is slow or laggy for you, try one of the builds below! (those are not laggy!) Not going full screen in the web version might also help.

You are the Fire Keeper.

These woods have gotten completely engulfed in thick fog! Get some lumber, light the 5 fires and keep them lit to cleanse the forest. Use your trusty Fire-finder if you forgot where they are.

Playable with keyboard or controller.

How to play?

You have three items at your disposal:

The 🏮 lantern can be used to light the fires & or “activated” to whoosh away the fog.
The 🪓 axe can be used to cut down trees
The 📱 trusty fire-finder can be used to find those camp fires places in this dense fog

Can you keep all 5 camp fires lit at the same time?

⌨️ - Keyboard Controls

Discover the misty forest with the WASD or arrow keys.
Take out your 🏮 lantern with the "1" key on your keyboard.
Take out your 🪓 axe with the "2" key on your keyboard and go to a tree.
Take out your 📱 trusty fire-finder with the "3" key on your keyboard.

Now, go and cut down some trees and light some fires!

🎮 - Gamepad Controls

You can also discover the misty forest with a gamepad!

Take out your 🏮 lantern with the "X" key on your gamepad.
Take out your 🪓 axe with the "Y" key on your gamepad and go to a tree.
Take out your 📱 trusty fire-finder with the "B" key on your gamepad.

Now, go and cut down some trees and light some fires!
